about_the_game:
ImmaterialAI Plus expands the praised ImmaterialAI platform with new features like Meta models, Dependency graphs, Task management, Train your intuition, Sanity check, Clusters and more, while upgrading the core ImmaterialAI experience for a better symbiosis between new and existing functionality.

Recent IAI Plus Additions:
  • world constraints
  • node type parents

NEW: Return to Bliss Season 3 - unlock exclusive rewards if you finish "Return to Bliss" on Diamond before Jan 1st 2024

Found in ImmaterialAI Plus Lite

Meta models

  • create new dimensions of data
    • node types e.g. Person, Entity, Event, Feeling, Worldview, Belief
      • (NEW) node types can have parents, searching for a type also returns all subtypes
    • link types e.g. Parallels, Depends on, Related to
  • update default node and link types
  • ability to constrain link types to specific node types
  • hotwords to query through meta data from the search bar, use "meta" to show all node and link types
  • set custom colors and icons to your meta data, visible all throughout the app (in graphs too!)
  • Tapping on the category of a node/link type will filter your home page to show only node/link types
  • Tapping on the category of a node (e.g. feeling 'happy') to filter only feelings will now also show up the node type itself
  • (NEW) expand any node type to see all the nodes part of that type

To-do system

  • Assign to-do status to any node
  • Standalone auto-generated task board,
  • (NEW) create tasks and nodes on the fly inside the task board
  • Task filter added to the home page
  • hotwords to query through all tasks from the search bar, type "todo", "inprogress", "done","tasks" and variations to show tasks of different states

Unique to ImmaerialAI Plus

Sanity check

  • calculate the validity of your entire library pre- and post- AI processing in less than a second
  • validity distribution across your entire library - find unknowns (known and unknown), changes, differences between relative and absolute validity in your data, validity distribution
  • stats on all your nodes, links and clusters
  • detect all known and unknown unknowns

Quantum

  • Quantum field: see all related and unrelated nodes as one whole graph + ability to export it
  • Quantum noise
    • pick recommended nodes from your library through quantum noise (affected by entanglement)
    • requires internet to access latest Australian lab data (only feature to require internet, no user data gets sent to Australian labs
    • ability to exclude already-picked nodes in picks of 3 and 5 nodes

AI

  • Plus-exclude AI-flows
    • Reshape+: reshape previous experiences at an absolute or relative level
    • Transcend: transcend any negative inner states instantly
    • (NEW) Fearless: deal with any fears at an absolute level
  • Plus-exclude AI functions
    • Check for link: input any 2 concepts and the AI will find out if they are linked, directly or n-th degree indirectly
    • Sugar Pills: induce placebos willingly
    • Clusters: calculate how your data is clustered based on all your nodes and relations + view clusters as graphs and easily export them
  • Dependency graph: autogenerated dependency graph now available in the AI tab of any node
  • quickly add dependencies and dependents from any node's AI tab
  • Mentions: automatically detect and show all mentions of your focused node in other nodes, tap on mentioner to open that node
  • (NEW) Mentions get filtered by selected worlds, so no node in an un-selected world that mentions your focused node shows up

Train your intuition

  • train your ability to successfully tap into answers/information in rationally impossible ways (impossible within current materialism)
  • 3 difficulties: easy/medium/hard
  • animated charts for statistics:
    • consecutive correct predictions (per difficulty)
    • overall average correct predictions (per difficulty)

Worlds

  • split your library into multiple worlds
  • while having one or more worlds selected, ALL app features work only with the data in those worlds
  • when you have at least a world selected, new nodes have the first selected world as their designated worlds
  • expand any world to see all the nodes part of that world
  • (NEW) auto-generated "None" world containing all nodes without a world assigned
  • (NEW) can add constraints on any world

Home page+

  • 'Me' page, auto-generated from 'current' and 'old me' links
  • ancestry filter: show only 'root'. 'parent', 'child' nodes, autogenerated from existing 'parent' links
  • world filter: show nodes tied only to specific worlds
  • Separate multiple search flters with '|' e.g. todo|favorites|cat:feeling|a for all feelings in-progress that are favorites and contain 'a'
  • escape hotwords with '/' prefix

Customization

  • Quickly add multiple nodes at once
  • Rich text formatting with Markdown in nodes
  • Add links and images to your nodes' contents
  • (NEW) Inline nodes you can expand inside any nodes' description + create nodes to add into descriptions on the fly
  • (NEW) create tables inside node descriptions
  • Multiple UI skins
  • 20+ color filters, customizable filter colors
  • Custom backgrounds

name: ImmaterialAI 5 Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works with APUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: ImmaterialAI Plus expands the praised ImmaterialAI platform with new features like Meta models, Dependency graphs, Task management, Train your intuition, Sanity check, Clusters and more, while upgrading the core ImmaterialAI experience for a better symbiosis between new and existing functionality.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Hindi, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
